headline: FactSet Meets Demand for AI-Ready Data, First to Announce MCP Sans Intermediary
summary: Available now, FactSet’s model context protocol (MCP) server delivers extensive AI-ready market data for enterprise and agentic applicationsNORWALK, Conn., Dec. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- FactSet (NYSE:FDS | NASDAQ:FDS), a global financial digital platform and enterprise solutions provider, today announced availability of the industry’s first production-grade model context protocol (MCP) server delivering real-time access to its financial intelligence, enabling AI systems to reason over truste

content.title: FactSet Meets Demand for AI-Ready Data, First to Announce MCP Sans Intermediary
content.summary: Available now, FactSet’s model context protocol (MCP) server delivers extensive AI-ready market data for enterprise and agentic applicationsNORWALK, Conn., Dec. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- FactSet (NYSE:FDS | NASDAQ:FDS), a global financial digital platform and enterprise solutions provider, today announced availability of the industry’s first production-grade model context protocol (MCP) server delivering real-time access to its financial intelligence, enabling AI systems to reason over truste
